activities: Medpace Reference Laboratories (MRL) is a global leader in providing customized, high quality, full-service laboratory services to the pharmaceutical and biotech clinical development industries. MRL collects and processes data relating to worldwide clinical research studies. This data is collected and transferred to the United States in order to fulfill its business responsibilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, Off-line, Manually and Electronically Processed, Human Resources data, clinical trial data, customer data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
